title: Mushy Pea Pasta Salad
ingredients: 1⁄2 cup (120 ml) extra virgin olive oil
Kosher salt and freshly cracked black pepper, to taste
8ounces (227 g) lumachine pasta or your desired small shape, cooked according to the package directions until al dente and cooled
3ounces (about 3⁄4 cup/85 g) whole pitted Castelvetrano olives, thinly sliced
1⁄2 large fennel bulb, cored and thinly sliced on a mandoline
1⁄2 small red onion, thinly sliced on a mandoline and rinsed
1⁄4 cup (8 g) chopped fresh mint leaves
directions: 1. Add the peas, olive oil, salt, and pepper to a food processor, and pulse a few times until the peas become a chunky mash.2. Add the pasta, feta, olives, fennel, onion, dill, parsley, mint, and mashed peas to a large bowl. Add the lemon zest and lemon juice, and toss to combine.3. Season with more salt and pepper, and serve.
